title: Do You Deserve To Be A Faster Driver? -- AFTER/DRIVE
description: Today's driver-assistance technology lets ANYONE lap a racetrack quicker than ever, even the pros. But do we DESERVE to be faster if we don't have the skills? With Tim Stevens, CNET and Jason Harper, Bloomberg News.
tags: performance driving, road racing, driver aids, technology
